A Zestimate® home valuation is Zillow's estimated market value. It is not an appraisal. Use it as a starting point to determine a home's value. Learn more

A Rent Zestimate® is Zillow's estimated monthly rental price, computed using a proprietary formula. It is a starting point in determining the monthly rental price for a specific property.

Thinking About Selling?

My Notes

Edit
5504 Griffith Rd, Gaithersburg, MD is a single family home that contains 2,010 sq ft and was built in 1978. It contains 2.5 bathrooms. This home last sold for $590,000 in May 2005.

The Zestimate for this house is $504,364, which has increased by $3,246 in the last 30 days. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $2,500/mo, which has increased by $236/mo in the last 30 days. The property tax in 2014 was $3,546. The tax assessment in 2014 was $346,100.

  • Lot: 2 acres
  • Single Family
  • Built in 1978
  • All time views: 76
  • Heating: Other
  • Last sold: May 2005 for $590,000
  • Great solar potential
    Sun Number™: 73

Sun Number™ rates a home's potential for solar using a scale of 1-100. The higher the number, the better suited a home is for solar and the more money you could save.

Market temp 

Based on three metrics—sale-to-list price ratio, the prevalence of price cuts on home listings, and time-on-market—the market temperature provides information on the current balance of bargaining power between buyers and sellers in this zip code relative to other zip codes in the same metropolitan area. A particular zip code may be identified as a good market for buyers in a metro market favorable to sellers overall. Learn more
